body_html: I've just chatted with @ezyang who showed me how the CI works and how to send patches. It might change some expects in the tests, that I will need to fix. The change will be that if you have two modules that share the same parameter (e.g. linear layers with tied weights), then there will be a single input in the trace for those two usages, so the trace will reflect the sharing. I think that right now two inputs will show up, but only one will actually be used, so it ends up being quite weird (but I haven't verified this). Let me know if you have any concerns
